column1:
Appellant 
was  denied 
a 
fair 
trial 
on 
following 
basis;

1.  That 
the 
trial 
was 
commenced 
on 
a 
defective

indictment 
in 
contravention 
of 
the  Criminal  Procedure

2.  That 
the 
trial 
continued  on 
a 
defective 
indictment

and 
as 
a 
result 
the 
trial 
is 
rendered 
invalid'

3. That 
the 
Accused - Appellant 
was 
denied 
a 
fair 
trial

on 
the 
basis 
that  he  was 
not 
properly 
defended 
by

the 
counsel 
assigned 
for 
him 
by 
court.
